content.html: This morning Kwasi Kwarteng announced: - Benefit cuts for part-time workers - More attacks on trade union rights - Tax cuts for the top 1% - Lowest corporation tax in the G20 - Uncapped bonuses for bankers The only thing this #BankersBudget will grow is inequality.
content.value:
This morning Kwasi Kwarteng announced: 

- Benefit cuts for part-time workers
- More attacks on trade union rights
- Tax cuts for the top 1%
- Lowest corporation tax in the G20
- Uncapped bonuses for bankers

The only thing this #BankersBudget will grow is inequality.
